General.Name: Huadian Ener-B
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Huadian Energy Company Limited engages in the generation and sale of electric power in China. The company generates electric power through thermal sources, as well as provides heat services. It has an installed capacity of 6.412 million kilowatts of thermal power. The company was formerly known as Heilongjiang Electric Power Co. Ltd. and changed its name to Huadian Energy Company Limited in July 2004. Huadian Energy Company Limited was founded in 1993 and is based in Harbin, China.
